WidgetInfo.Description: This widget offers a quick way to print map
WidgetInfo.Label: Quick Plot
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click to create a plot quickly

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display any UI for the widget. If empty, a new window is used
Parameter.Label: Target

Parameter.Name: RememberPlotOptions
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to persist the current QuickPlot UI settings to a cookie. If empty or false, these settings will not be saved
Parameter.Label: RememberPlotOptions

Parameter.Name: ShowCoordinateLabels
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to show the coordinate labels in the QuickPlot preview dialog. If empty, will default to true
Parameter.Label: ShowCoordinateLabels

Parameter.Name: ShowSubTitle
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether to show the sub title in the QuickPlot UI and preview dialog. If empty, will default to true
Parameter.Label: ShowSubTitle

Parameter.Name: DefaultDpi
Parameter.Description: Indicates the default DPI to use for plotting. If specified, this will hide the DPI field in the QuickPlot UI and will override whatever DPI is used.
Parameter.Label: DefaultDpi

Parameter.Name: PaperListEntry
Parameter.Description: Indicates a list of name/value pairs that will override the paper size list in the QuickPlot UI if specified.
Parameter.Label: PaperListEntry

Parameter.Name: ScaleListEntry
Parameter.Description: Indicates a list of name/value pairs that will override the scale list in the QuickPlot UI if specified.
Parameter.Label: ScaleListEntry

Parameter.Name: DefaultMargin
Parameter.Description: Indicates the default Margin to use for plotting. If specified, this will hide the Margin field in the QuickPlot UI and will override whatever Margin is used.
Parameter.Label: Margin

Parameter.Name: Disclaimer
Parameter.Description: The legal disclaimer text to show in the preview dialog and final printout
Parameter.Label: Disclaimer
Parameter.DefaultValue: The materials available at this web site are for informational purposes only and do not constitute a legal document.
